metadata.title: CVE-2023-37209 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A use-after-free condition existed in `NotifyOnHistoryReload` where a`LoadingSessionHistoryEntry` object was freed and a reference to thatobject remained. This resulted in a potentially exploitable condition whenthe reference to that object was later reused. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 115.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
